thread.title: U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem Opens to a Fraught Climate

author: Felicia Schwartz
title: U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem Opens to a Fraught Climate
text:
JERUSALEM—The opening of the relocated U.S. Embassy here fulfills a campaign promise of President Donald Trump’s while dialing up tension around another administration goal: peace in the Middle East.
Mr. Trump’s decision to relocate the embassy to Jerusalem from Tel Aviv has faced fierce criticism from European and Arab officials who say it could hamper any future peace negotiations. Palestinians are refusing to meet with representatives of the Trump administration and say they no longer recognize the U.S. as the main broker...
